name: Warehouse 71: Peters Perception
description: Peter Wisen is an investigative Reporter/ Community Hero. So naturally when hes bee getting calls about  strange noises coming from warehouse 71 he has no choice to get to the bottom of it.  Now, armed with just his camera, Peter is forced to navigate the dark rooms of warehouse 71 in search of the spark plug he needs to restore power to the generator. Once again hes going  it alone...Or is he?
